column5: i m looking to go icefishing mid feb for a day or two where should we go there will be about 6 of us ?  i would like to try the kawarthas if anyone knows an outfitter that started up there that would be great ,thanks shawn

Head to lake Simcoe or Bay of Quinte. Do a search for "Simcoe (or Qunite) ice hut rentals" Both big bodies of water with lots of hut operators & lots of fish. Quinte would be mainly for Walleye & Simcoe would be mainly Lake Trout & White fish (or Perch).

i go to simcoe all the time and the hut guys are ok but 15 trips over the last 3 years and poor results, always should have been there yeasterday lol, thats why i want to try somewhere else ,thanks shawn
If you're looking at Kawarthas, I've heard really good things about Kashabog lodge...
thanks johnny any clue what lake there on?
Sorry...I meant Kashaga Lodge (click this) on Lake Kashagawigamog.  All those names sound the same to me...
That's more like Haliburton rather than the Kawarthas.  I believe that there are one or two operators out of Bewdley on Rice and Cliff mentioned something about Lunge Haven on Sturgeon.
